name: Plugin Name: Evgeny Muravjev Typograph
author: Evgeny Muravjev (typograph), Vladimir Sokolov (plugin)

sections.description:
A tool to format the text using the rules, regulations and the specifics of the Russian language and screen typography. It can be connected to all text editors, engine and blogs.

Инструмент для форматирования текста с использованием норм, правил и специфики русского языка и экранной типографики. Его можно подключать ко всем редакторам текста, движкам и блогам.
sections.installation:
Install from the WordPress repository.

With large text blocks the algorithm works slowly, therefore it is recommended to use the cache (for example, using the plugin WP Super Cache).

short_description: A tool to format the text using the rules, regulations and the specifics of the Russian language and screen typography.
